义务教育教科书四年级上册义务教育教科书英 语四年级上册 （三年级起点） （三年级起点） ENGLISH 英语 产品定价：5.35元全国价格举报电话：12315 
[中国] 河北 教育 出版 社 [加拿大] DC加拿大国际交流中心合作编写 ENGLISH 义务教育教科书英语四年级上册 （三年级起点） 
亲爱的同学们，欢迎你们进入四年级！ 学习英语一年了，你们已经能用英语互相问候，能说出多种颜色和身体部位，能表达自己的感受，能用英语介绍动物，还了解了中西方的饮食文化。 这学期丹尼、詹妮和李明会带领你们学习有关服装、在家里的活动、出行、问路以及购物等内容。 你们想用英语说出衣物名称吗？ 你们想知道怎样用英语描述在家做的事情吗？ 你们想学会用英语问路吗？ 你们想知道怎样用英语购物吗？那就开始这学期的学习吧！ 请你们在学习中积极参与听做、说唱、玩演和读写的活动，你们就会体会到英语学习有趣且容易！ 同学们，上学期我们介绍了词汇学习的方法，你们感到认读、识记词汇很容易吧！从这学期开始，你们将学习仿写语句。仿写时要注意书写的格式， 如大小写及标点的正确运用等。遇到问题时，你们要主动向老师或同学请教。 相信你们一定会学得很棒！ 致同 学

content: 60 Lesson 24 Etta’s Teddy Bear Story time 1 2 3 Etta has a teddy bear. His name is Teddy. Teddy is her good friend. Etta cries. Her mother takes her to the toy shop. Etta does not like the new teddy bears there. Etta cannot find Teddy today. Where is he ? She looks for him everywhere. Let’s buy a new teddy bear. 4 Let’s go to the clothes shop to buy a new skirt. 61 ★ Read and order Etta cannot find her teddy bear. They go to the clothes shop. Her mother takes her to the toy shop. She cries. She finds Teddy in the bed. They go to the restaurant. 5 6 7 It is time to go to bed. Then she sees… TEDDY!!! Etta is happy to find Teddy. Etta likes the new skirt, but she still wants her teddy bear. Etta likes hamburgers and ice cream. But she can’t forget her teddy bear. Mum, here is my teddy bear! 8 Let’s go to the restaurant to have hamburgers and ice cream. How did you get in there?!

They live in a house. Goldilocks and the Three Bears One day, Mother Bear makes soup for dinner. The three bears go for a walk before dinner. The soup is hot. Let’s go for a walk. Okay. Okay.

content: 74 Just then, a small girl walks by the house. Her name is Goldilocks. She goes into the house. She sees the soup on the table. She tries Mother Bear’s soup. She tries Father Bear’s soup. She tries Baby Bear’s soup. Then she eats Baby Bear’s soup. She sees three beds. She tries Mother Bear’s bed. She tries Father Bear’s bed. She tries Baby Bear’s bed. Then she goes to sleep in Baby Bear’s bed. This bed is big, too. This bed is just right. This is too cold. This is just right. This is too hot. I’m lost. I’m hungry. This bed is big. 75 They want to eat soup. They go to the table. Just then the three bears come home. They are hungry. Then they go to the bed. They see Goldilocks. Someone was sleeping in my bed. Someone was sleeping in my bed, and here she is. Someone ate my soup. Someone ate all my soup!

content: 76 Just then Goldilocks wakes up. She sees the three bears looking at her. She runs out of the house. She runs and runs, far away. Help, help! baby 婴儿 before （指时间）在……以前 just 正好；恰好 try 试；尝试 sleep 睡觉 someone 某人；有人 all 全部；所有 wake 醒；醒来 away 向远处；远离 77 The Black Bike Ann has a black bike. Look, it’s near the tree. Does Ann go to work by bike on Monday ? No. She goes to work by bus. Does Ann go to work by bike on Tuesday ? No. She goes to work by car on Tuesday. The bus is fast. The bike is slow. The car is fast. The bike is slow. 78 Does Ann go to work by bike on Friday ? No. She goes to work by taxi on Friday. She doesn’t like the bike. On Sunday, Ann goes to Bei j ing. How does Ann go to Bei j ing ? She goes to Bei j ing by plane. The bike is sad. The taxi is fast. The bike is slow. Beijing is far. I’ll go by plane. The bike can’t fly. Ann doesn’t like me.

content: 79 Today it is very hot. There are many cars and buses on the street. They go very, very slowly. And the sky isn’t blue. The air is dirty. The trees and the flowers feel sick. Oh! So slow! I’ll be late! Me, too. Help! Help! I feel sick. 80 Riding bikes can help keep the air clean. Ann goes to work by bike today. She is tired but happy. The sky is happy. The tree is happy. The flowers are happy. The black bike is happy. Ann is happy, too. My bike is good. Thank you. Ann, you’re good. fast 快的 slow 慢的 plane 飞机 air 空气 dirty 脏的 ﬂ ower 花 sky 天空 ride 骑；搭乘 keep 保持 Yes, I like my bike now. Thank you, Ann. We like you and your bike. Do you go to work by bike today?
